name: softwood
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
wood from fast-growing evergreen trees (= ones that never lose their leaves) like pine, or a tree of this type: window frames made from softwood A 200,000-acre forest site will be replanted with softwoods to supply the paper and pulp mill. Compare
hardwood
